lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers announced the firing of their head coach on Sunday, dumping Jim Tomsula after just one season during which he failed to restore the franchise anywhere close to its former glory.    Tomsula was appointed to the top position in place of Jim Harbaugh, who returned to the college ranks following last season when the 49ers began to show signs of decline.    But the 2015 season was a bust as the 49ers stumbled to a 5-11 record.

headline.print_headline: 49ers Ax Head Coach Tomsula After One Season
headline.main: 49ers Ax Head Coach Tomsula After One Season
